definitions.definition: A name ascribed to the stepdaughter of Herod who asked for the execution of John the Baptist .
A woman mentioned in Mark 16:1, present at the crucifixion of Christ.
A female given name from Ancient Greek [in turn from Hebrew], masculine equivalent Solomon .
A census-designated place in La Paz County , Arizona , United States . named after Mrs. Grace Salome Pratt.

main_definition: A name ascribed to the stepdaughter of Herod who asked for the execution of John the Baptist .
secondary_definitions: ( biblical ) A woman mentioned in Mark 16:1, present at the crucifixion of Christ.
( rare ) A female given name from Ancient Greek [in turn from Hebrew], masculine equivalent Solomon .
A census-designated place in La Paz County , Arizona , United States . named after Mrs. Grace Salome Pratt.
